tweet: With massive changes to testing and contact tracing in Ontario, trends in daily case counts will not be as reliable as they were previously.   Best now to look at several indicators together - e.g., cases, tests, backlog, % positive, hospitalizations, deaths, LTC outbreaks.

I think we're in a double-transition phase.   The first one is the transition from the wild west towards a mature & regulated market surrounding #bitcoin and blockchain.  The second one is getting rid of overvalued Top 10 coins like $XRP, $BCH & $LTC to fundamentally strong ones.

I work in a LTC home.  Outbreaks are triggered when community viral activity is high.  What you do in the community affects us directly and puts us in danger.  I love my work. The residents whom I serve. The teams I work with.  Please think of us. Please.
